title: Payment calculator
description: RARELY AVAILABLE OVERSIZED 1-BEDROOM, 1-BATHROOM WITH SWEEPING VIEWS & nbsp;  Perched on the 20th floor of the legendary Stewart House, this 1,108 SF residence offers abundant natural light, open city views, and generous proportions rarely found in Greenwich Village.   & nbsp;  An expansive entry foyer doubles as a versatile home office, flowing into an incredible 33-foot great room with a large dining alcove. The windowed chef's kitchen features stainless steel appliances, bespoke cabinetry, and blue quartz countertops.   & nbsp;  The oversized bedroom suite easily accommodates a king-sized bed and additional furniture, with bright eastern exposures. The bathroom is pristine, with a custom vanity and shower/tub combination. Four walk-in closets provide exceptional storage throughout.   & nbsp;  RESIDENCE HIGHLIGHTS  & nbsp; - & nbsp; 1,108 SF of interior living space - Expansive living room with a separate dining alcove - Windowed chef's kitchen - Open city views that overlook Astor Place to the Williamsburg Bridge - Spacious entry foyer/home office - 4 walk-in closets - Hardwood flooring - Central heating/cooling via PTAC systems  & nbsp;  The Stewart House is a white-glove, full-service cooperative with a reputation for exceptional service and financial stability. Residents enjoy: - 24-hour doorman, live-in superintendent, on-site resident manager - Landscaped circular driveway and entry garden - Fitness center - Children's playroom - Resident-only garden with comfortable seating and table areas - Bike room - Two laundry facilities - Package room - Additional storage units available for rent - On-site garage with direct building access  & nbsp;  Trust ownership and guarantors are permitted, with gifting permitted on a case-by-case basis.   Prudent financial management has allowed the co-op to maintain low maintenance fees while investing millions to enhance both residents' quality of life and shareholder value.   & nbsp;  Situated at the crossroads of Greenwich Village, Union Square, and Washington Square Park, The Stewart House offers immediate access to the city's best dining, shopping, and cultural destinations, as well as multiple subway lines. Wegmans, Trader Joe's, and Whole Foods are all within minutes.   & nbsp;  Residence 20C presents a rare opportunity to own a spacious, light-filled home in one of Greenwich Village's most sought-after cooperatives.
